video.title: Final 24
video.synopsis: Each installment of this series follows the last 24 hours in the life of a famous person who died under tragic and/or mysterious circumstances.

episodes.synopsis: Punk icon Sid Vicious was a young heroin addict suspected of killing his lover. Uncover a shocking revelation about his final day.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 1: Sid Vicious

episodes.synopsis: Explore the depth of legendary comedian John Belushi's drug addiction, following him through the hours leading up to his one final reckless act.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 1: John Belushi

episodes.synopsis: Relive the tragic last day of Hollywood golden boy River Phoenix, whose short life was dominated by the constant pressure to perform.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 1: River Phoenix

episodes.synopsis: After a lifetime of drug-fueled antics that inspired his literary work, "Gonzo journalist" Hunter S. Thompson carefully planned taking his own life.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 1: Hunter S. Thompson

episodes.synopsis: Marvin Gaye's violent childhood, his strained relationship with his father and his struggle with addiction all conspired toward his demise.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 1: Marvin Gaye

episodes.synopsis: John Kennedy Jr.'s life was cut short when his small plane plunged into the Atlantic -- the result of a string of errors that also killed his wife.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 1: John F. Kennedy

episodes.synopsis: This episode maps out designer Gianni Versace's last day alive and the dramatic events that led to his brutal murder at the hands of a serial killer.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 2: Gianni Versace

episodes.synopsis: It's Feb. 7, 2007. American model Anna Nicole Smith is in Fort Lauderdale, Fla., to buy a boat. In 24 hours, she will be dead.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 2: Anna Nicole Smith

episodes.synopsis: Using archive footage, reenactments and interviews, this episode details the last 24 hours of troubled Doors front man Jim Morrison's life.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 2: Jim Morrison

episodes.synopsis: Dramatic reenactments and interviews with intimates help illustrate the last 24 hours of rock legend Janis Joplin.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 2: Janis Joplin

episodes.synopsis: This episode documents the final moments of Keith Moon, the hard-partying drummer for the Who, through archival footage, reenactments and interviews.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 2: Keith Moon

episodes.synopsis: June 12, 1994. In 24 hours, Nicole Brown Simpson's dream life will be shattered, and her ex-husband, O.J. Simpson, will stand accused of her murder.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 2: Nicole Simpson Brown

episodes.synopsis: Featuring archival footage, reenactments and interviews, this episode documents the final moments of Branch Davidian leader David Koresh's life.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 2: David Koresh

episodes.synopsis: Gangster rapper Tupac Shakur once said he would go out in a blaze of glory. This episode documents the last moments before his prophecy came true.
episodes.title: Final 24: Season 2: Tupac Shakur
